nodes.bodyText: Why is LifeVersionConflict counted as an InternalServerError? does this error code mean that the operation has to be retried after replication converges?

First of all it's not a client error for sure. If we see this, then something is wrong with delete and undelete operations. Maybe we have some delete operations performed between undeletes. I would not recommend a retry if we see this, we should try to figure out what happened first.
Thanks for the explanation. I thought that it would equate to a conflict http status at first
Add some comments to explain why it's InternalServerError ?
